item.title: 美联储再次降息 "迷雾重重
item.description: 预计美联储将在周三将利率下调四分之一个百分点，决策者将根据有限的数据来引导美国经济，但这些数据仍让人们对就业市场的强劲程度保持高度关注。【原文：The Federal Reserve is expected to cut interest rates by a quarter of a percentage point on Wednesday as policymakers steer the U.S. economy based on limited data that has nevertheless kept concerns about the strength of the job market top of mind.】

item.title: 全球企业在情绪疲软和人工智能推动下裁员
item.description: 全球企业纷纷加大裁员力度，从亚马逊到雀巢和 UPS 等蓝筹股都在控制支出，同时消费者情绪低迷，以人工智能为重点的科技公司开始用自动化取代工作岗位。【原文：Companies around the globe have ramped up job cuts, with blue-chips from Amazon to Nestle and UPS reining in spending while consumer sentiment dims and AI-focused tech companies start to replace jobs with automation.】

item.title: 贸易部长称，尽管美国达成协议，但马来西亚仍禁止稀土原料出口
item.description: 马来西亚贸易部长周三表示，尽管本周与美国签署了一项重要的矿产协议，但马来西亚将继续禁止稀土原料出口，以保护国内资源。【原文：Malaysia will maintain a ban on the export of raw rare earths to protect its domestic resources, despite signing a critical minerals deal with the United States this week, the trade minister said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 特朗普称可能就英伟达 "超强 "黑韦尔芯片与中国习近平通话
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）周三表示，他将在周四与中国国家主席习近平的会晤中就英伟达（Nvidia）公司最先进的人工智能芯片Blackwell发表讲话。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump said on Wednesday he will speak to Chinese President Xi Jinping about Nvidia's state-of-the-art Blackwell artificial intelligence chip at their expected meeting on Thursday.】

item.title: 报告称 2026 年关税将提高成本并推迟石油和天然气项目
item.description: 德勤（Deloitte）周三发布的一份报告显示，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的全面关税措施将在2026年提高石油和天然气行业的运营成本、扰乱供应链并削弱投资势头。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump's sweeping tariffs are set to raise operating costs, disrupt supply chains and weaken investment momentum for the oil and gas industry in 2026, a report published by Deloitte showed on Wednesday.】

item.title: 美国原油库存减少，油价上扬
item.description: 市场消息称美国原油库存下降，油价在连续三日下跌后于周三上午上扬，但投资者对俄罗斯制裁和欧佩克+可能增产的担忧抑制了油价的涨幅。【原文：Oil prices edged up on Wednesday morning after three straight days of declines, with market sources citing a decline in U.S. crude inventories, while investor concerns about Russia sanctions and a potential OPEC+ output increase capped gains.】

item.title: 丰田称未明确向特朗普承诺在美投资 100 亿美元
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）提到可能在美国投资 100 亿美元后的第二天，日本丰田汽车公司（Toyota Motor）的一位高管周三表示，该公司并未明确承诺在美国投资 100 亿美元。【原文：Japan's Toyota Motor did not explicitly promise a new $10 billion investment in the United States, a senior executive from the Japanese automaker said on Wednesday, a day after President Donald Trump mentioned a potential investment of that size.】

item.title: 亚洲股市因对人工智能持乐观态度而上涨，投资者为美联储和科技公司财报做准备
item.description: 由于对人工智能的新一波乐观情绪，周三亚洲股市从华尔街得到提振，投资者准备迎接繁忙的一天，美联储的决定和科技重磅公司的财报将是这一天的重头戏。【原文：Asian shares got a lift from Wall Street on Wednesday thanks to a fresh wave of optimism over artificial intelligence, as investors braced for a busy day headlined by the Federal Reserve's decision and earnings from technology heavyweights.】

item.title: 总统办公室称亚马逊子公司将在韩国投资 50 亿美元
item.description: 韩国总统府周三表示，亚马逊网络服务公司将在 2031 年前在韩国投资至少 50 亿美元，在这个亚洲国家建立新的人工智能数据中心。【原文：Amazon Web Services will invest at least $5 billion in South Korea by 2031 to build new artificial intelligence data centres in the Asian country, South Korea's presidential office said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 特朗普称有望降低与芬太尼相关的对华关税
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周三表示，他希望降低美国对中国商品征收的关税，以换取中国政府承诺遏制芬太尼前体化学品的出口。【原文：President Donald Trump said on Wednesday he expects to reduce U.S. tariffs on Chinese goods in exchange for Beijing’s commitment to curb exports of fentanyl precursor chemicals.】

item.title: 据英国《金融时报》报道，赛默飞接近以 100 亿美元收购克拉里奥公司
item.description: 据英国《金融时报》周二报道，医疗设备制造商赛默飞世尔即将全现金收购美国克拉里奥公司，这笔交易可能使这家临床试验数据管理公司的估值达到约 100 亿美元。【原文：Medical equipment maker Thermo Fisher is nearing an all-cash takeover of U.S-based Clario in a deal that could value the clinical trial data management company at about $10 billion, the Financial Times reported on Tuesday.】

item.title: 富士康将在休斯顿人工智能服务器工厂部署仿人机器人
item.description: 全球最大的电子产品制造商、英伟达（Nvidia）的主要人工智能服务器制造商富士康周二表示，将在为英伟达（Nvidia）生产人工智能服务器的休斯顿工厂部署仿人机器人。【原文：Foxconn , the world's largest electronics maker and Nvidia's key AI server maker, said on Tuesday it will deploy humanoid robots at its Houston plant that produces AI servers for Nvidia.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，Francisco Partners 将在私有化交易中收购 Jamf
item.description: 私募股权公司 Francisco Partners 接近达成收购设备管理软件提供商 Jamf 的交易，两位熟悉内情的人士称，该公司在上市五年多一点后被私有化。【原文：Private equity firm Francisco Partners is close to a deal to buy device management software provider Jamf , two people familiar with the matter said, taking the company private a little more than five years after its market debut.】

item.title: 韩国贸易代表描绘中美竞争中的生存之道
item.description: 韩国最高贸易特使在主持亚太领导人贸易论坛时表示，韩国的目标是深化与美国的合作，稳定与中国的供应链，并使其贸易伙伴多样化，以应对全球挑战。【原文：South Korea aims to deepen cooperation with the United States, stabilise supply chains with China, and diversify its trading partners to navigate global challenges, its top trade envoy said as the country hosts Asia-Pacific leaders for a trade forum.】

item.title: 美元在美联储减息预期前受挫，澳元因 CPI 而上涨
item.description: 周三，在市场普遍预期美联储将在当天晚些时候降息之前，美元兑主要货币汇率徘徊在一周低点附近。【原文：The U.S. dollar hovered close to a one-week low versus major peers on Wednesday ahead of a widely expected interest rate cut from the Federal Reserve later in the day.】

item.title: 英伟达首席执行官预计本周将与韩国合作伙伴发布消息
item.description: 英伟达公司（Nvidia）首席执行官黄仁勋（Jensen Huang）周二表示，他预计本周美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）访问韩国时，将与韩国公司共同宣布一些令美国和韩国高兴的消息。【原文：Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang said on Tuesday he expects to make announcements with South Korean companies that will please U.S. President Donald Trump and South Korea when he visits the country this week.】

item.title: 澳大利亚禁止 Blockchain Global 董事出国
item.description: 澳大利亚企业监管机构周三表示，联邦法院已禁止失败的加密货币交易所公司Blockchain Global的董事Ryan Xu在12月20日之前离开澳大利亚。【原文：Australia's corporate regulator said on Wednesday the federal court has barred failed cryptocurrency exchange firm Blockchain Global's director, Ryan Xu, from leaving the country until December 20.】

item.title: SK 海力士认为内存芯片 "超级周期 "将延长
item.description: SK 海力士（SK Hynix）周三表示，预计全球存储芯片市场将经历一个漫长的 "超级周期"，就在人工智能应用需求扩大之际，供应增长可能会受到限制。【原文：SK Hynix on Wednesday said it expects the global memory chip market to experience a prolonged "super cycle", and that supply growth is likely to be limited just as demand for AI applications expands.】

item.title: 澳大利亚第三季度核心通胀率跳升，成为降息的主要障碍
item.description: 由于电费和地方政府收费攀升，澳大利亚消费者价格在 9 月份创下两年多来的最大涨幅，而令人震惊的核心通胀率大幅飙升似乎排除了近期降息的可能性。【原文：Australian consumer prices rose by the most in over two years in the September quarter as electricity and local government charges climbed, while a shockingly large jump in core inflation seemed to rule out a near-term interest rate cut.】

item.title: 澳大利亚首富加倍持有澳大利亚阿拉弗拉稀土公司股份
item.description: 澳大利亚首富吉娜-莱因哈特（Gina Rinehart）加倍增持了她在澳大利亚阿拉弗拉稀土公司（Arafura Rare Earths）的股份，尽管该开发商的股价周三因折价配股而下跌了五分之一以上。【原文：Australia's richest person Gina Rinehart has doubled down on her holdings in Australia's Arafura Rare Earths , even as shares of the developer fell by more than a fifth of its value on Wednesday due to a discounted share placement.】

item.title: 英伟达联手 Palantir 进军企业物流业务
item.description: Nvidia 和 Palantir Tech 周二宣布了一项协议，Palantir 将利用 Nvidia 的芯片和软件帮助其客户加快物流等复杂领域的决策速度。【原文：Nvidia and Palantir Tech on Tuesday announced a deal in which Palantir will tap Nvidia's chips and software to help its customers speed up decision making in complex fields such as logistics.】

item.title: 政府官员称，如果芯片危机持续，汽车制造商可能停止在巴西的生产
item.description: 一位官员周二表示，如果全球芯片供应危机持续下去，一些汽车制造商可能会在两到三周内停止在巴西的业务，他还补充说，巴西政府正在与中国当局联系，以寻求解决方案。【原文：Some automakers may halt operations in Brazil within two to three weeks if the global chips supply crisis continues, an official said on Tuesday, adding the Brazilian government is contacting Chinese authorities to find a solution.】

item.title: 英伟达供应商 SK 海力士季度利润创纪录，符合预期
item.description: 韩国 SK 海力士公司（SK Hynix）周三公布了创纪录的季度利润，原因是人工智能热潮推动了对先进芯片和传统产品的需求。【原文：South Korea's SK Hynix posted on Wednesday a record quarterly profit, spurred by an artificial intelligence boom that has driven up demand for both advanced chips and conventional products.】

item.title: 特朗普前往韩国，面对贸易谈判和朝鲜导弹问题
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）将于周三前往韩国参加其亚洲之行的最后一站，预计将与中国国家主席习近平和韩国总统李在明举行高风险会晤。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump heads to South Korea on Wednesday for the final leg of his Asia trip, with high-stakes meetings expected with Chinese President Xi Jinping and South Korea's Lee Jae Myung.】

item.title: OpenAI 因索拉的 "Cameo "功能被控商标侵权
item.description: 名人视频平台 Cameo 的制造商周二在加州联邦法院起诉 OpenAI，称 OpenAI 的 Sora 视频生成应用程序的新功能 "Cameo "侵犯了其商标权。【原文：The maker of celebrity video platform Cameo sued OpenAI in a California federal court on Tuesday, arguing that the new "Cameo" feature of OpenAI's Sora video generation app violates its trademark rights.】

item.title: 新预订量激增，CoStar 上调年度收入预期
item.description: 商业地产数据和分析公司 CoStar 周二上调了年度营收预期，第三季度营收超过预期，主要原因是预订量增加以及 Homes.com 等订阅型平台的增长。【原文：CoStar , a commercial real estate data and analytics firm, raised annual revenue forecast and beat third-quarter estimates on Tuesday, driven by higher bookings and growth across its subscription-based platforms such as Homes.com.】

item.title: Enphase Energy 预测第四季度营收低于预期，预示关税将受到冲击
item.description: Enphase Energy周二预测第四季度营收低于华尔街预期，并称美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的关税对其利润率产生了负面影响，导致这家太阳能逆变器制造商盘后股价下跌超过8%。【原文：Enphase Energy forecast fourth-quarter revenue below Wall Street estimates on Tuesday, and said U.S. President Donald Trump's tariffs had a negative impact on its margins, sending the solar inverter maker's shares down over 8% after hours.】

item.title: 新西兰央行称自 3 月以来裁员近 20
item.description: 新西兰中央银行在周三公布的文件中称，自 3 月份以来，该行已裁员近 20%。【原文：New Zealand's central bank said in documents released on Wednesday that it had cut nearly 20% of its staff since March.】

item.title: 泰瑞达预计季度收入高于预期，任命新首席财务官
item.description: 泰瑞达公司（Teradyne）周二预计，由于芯片测试设备需求强劲，第四季度收入将高于华尔街预期，并任命了新的首席财务官。【原文：Teradyne on Tuesday forecast fourth-quarter revenue above Wall Street expectations, banking on robust demand for its chip-testing equipment, and named a new chief financial officer.】

item.title: 澳大利亚林纳斯公司计划在马来西亚新建稀土设施
item.description: 澳大利亚林纳斯稀土公司（Lynas Rare Earths）周三表示，将在马来西亚新建一座重稀土分离设施，耗资约 1.8 亿澳元（1.1696 亿美元），以满足市场对中国以外氧化物的强劲需求。【原文：Australia's Lynas Rare Earths said on Wednesday it would set up a new heavy rare earth separation facility in Malaysia for around A$180 million ($116.96 million) to meet strong market demand for oxides sourced outside China.】
